metadata.title: Tampax Pocket Pearl Plastic Tampons, Duopack (Regular/Super Absorbency), Unscented, 30 Count (Packaging May Vary)
features: TAMPAX Pearl tampons have a LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they happen
TAMPAX Pearl tampons give up to eight hours of protection with a compact applicator
FormFit gently expands to your individual shape
Free of perfume and chlorine bleaching, with a core free of dyes* (*Braid has skin-friendly pigments)
description: Full-size protection that fits in your pocket. Youâ€™ll love the upgraded QuietTouch Wrapper that stays discreet in your purse or pocket and outstanding protection of TAMPAX Pocket Pearl. Free of perfume and chlorine bleaching, these tampons are clinically tested gentle on skin and designed with your body in mind. Featuring a LeakGuard Braid, TAMPAX Pocket Pearl tampons channel leaks back into the core free of dyes*, giving you up to eight hours of protection even on your heaviest days. Their FormFit design gently expands to your individual shape, while their Smooth Removal Layer gives you amazing comfort even on your lightest days. *Braid has skin-friendly pigments
